I have been looking at the Junit and Ant classpath problem in this 
list and the Ant user list and I am still pretty confused of what I 
should do to solve this problem.  Basically I want to use the 
<classpath> tag and avoid putting the junit.jar in ANT_HOME/lib 
directory.  I am positive I have the right syntax and the jars in the 
<classpath>.

Is there a simpler and concrete way to solve the problem of "could 
not find Junit task"?  The suggestions of modifyingthe optional.jar 
seems complicated.  I am using Junit3.8.1 and Ant 1.5.

Thanks in advance.

Fee
